<h3 id="X17834">X(17834)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st EXCOSINE TO ANTI-ASCELLA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^8-2*(3*b^4+2*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*a^4+8*(b^6+c^6)*a^2-(3*b^4+2*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(17834) = 3*X(3)-2*X(13346) = 4*X(26)-3*X(154) = 2*X(26)-X(155) = 3*X(26)-2*X(156) = 3*X(154)-2*X(155) = 9*X(154)-8*X(156) = 3*X(155)-4*X(156) = 2*X(1147)-3*X(14070) = 4*X(1147)-5*X(17821) = 3*X(1853)-4*X(12359) = 3*X(1853)-2*X(14790) = 3*X(2931)-2*X(15132) = 3*X(3167)-4*X(10282) = 3*X(3167)-5*X(16195) = 4*X(10282)-5*X(16195) = 6*X(14070)-5*X(17821) = 4*X(15132)-3*X(17847)

</b>
<p>X(17834) lies on these lines: {3,6}, {4,343}, {5,17810}, {20,6146}, {22,1181}, {23,11441}, {24,394}, {25,5562}, {26,154}, {30,64}, {51,7395}, {69,7487}, {141,7401}, {143,7514}, {159,12166}, {161,1498}, {184,9715}, {185,11414}, {221,7352}, {381,1209}, {517,1854}, {524,6193}, {539,17846}, {550,13292}, {632,5646}, {973,3060}, {1092,3515}, {1147,14070}, {1216,6642}, {1299,1628}, {1352,6756}, {1503,11411}, {1597,13598}, {1598,5907}, {1657,11750}, {1658,16266}, {1853,12359}, {1993,7488}, {1995,11444}, {2192,6238}, {2807,9911}, {2931,15132}, {3066,3090}, {3147,11064}, {3167,10282}, {3183,17850}, {3197,6237}, {3517,9306}, {3547,12233}, {3564,9833}, {3567,7509}, {3627,11472}, {3763,7405}, {3796,7512}, {5020,11793}, {5198,15030}, {5446,9818}, {5462,7393}, {5480,7404}, {5654,13383}, {5663,15085}, {5876,7530}, {5890,10323}, {5891,7529}, {5946,7516}, {6101,6644}, {6145,9927}, {6241,12082}, {6643,13567}, {6759,9909}, {6803,10519}, {6804,11821}, {7485,15043}, {7500,16655}, {7502,12161}, {7526,10263}, {7528,10516}, {7556,9707}, {7689,10606}, {8548,17813}, {8549,9019}, {8567,12084}, {8884,9308}, {9704,12316}, {9714,10539}, {9908,17836}, {10110,11479}, {10117,17838}, {10244,14530}, {10594,11459}, {10628,12310}, {10665,17819}, {10984,14831}, {11188,11387}, {11456,12088}, {11591,13861}, {11695,16419}, {12111,15107}, {12134,15069}, {12162,15811}, {12168,13417}, {13154,13363}, {14855,16936}, {17702,17835}</p>
<p>
X(17834) = reflection of X(155) in X(26)<br>
X(17834) = X(4) of 1st excosine triangle<br>
X(17834) = X(20) of tangential triangle<br>
X(17834) = X(5562) of Ara triangle<br>
X(17834) = Brocard-circle-inverse of X(37476)<br>
X(17834) = {X(3),X(6)}-harmonic conjugate of X(37476)<br>
X(17834) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 52, 6), (3, 1351, 578), (3, 11432, 182), (20, 6515, 6146), (22, 5889, 1181), (24, 11412, 394), (25, 5562, 17814), (26, 155, 154), (141, 11745, 7401), (182, 16625, 11432), (1350, 9786, 3), (3098, 9729, 3), (11438, 15644, 3), (13347, 14810, 3), (14810, 15012, 13347)<br>
</p>
